openai_prompt_template:
Extract all apartment listings from this HTML page.

IMPORTANT:
- DO NOT extract filter options, dropdowns, or form elements
- DO NOT extract navigation menus or pagination
- ONLY extract actual property listings with addresses and rental information
- Each listing should have at least: address/title, price, and bedrooms

HTML Content:
{html}

Return a JSON array of listing objects with these fields (use null if not found):
- listing_website
- title
- bedrooms
- bathrooms
- sqft
- price
- img_urls (array)
- full_address
- street
- city
- state
- description
- available_date
- phone_contact
- email_contact
- apply_now_link

Return ONLY the JSON array, no other text.
